name: py-dasbus

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Dasbus is a DBus library written in Python 3, based on GLib and inspired
by pydbus.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pygobject
dependencies.description: bindings for the GLib, and GObject, to be used in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-geopmdpy
dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.

dependent_to.name: geopm-service
dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
